text: @brithume @BDKoz These "studies" are about as reliable as the climate change models or the COVID-19 models.  Those with an agenda can fudge the data, adjust the parameters of their meta-analyses.  Almost--ALMOST--all the studies done in the past have found no benefit to wearing masks by the...
